description.zh: 從展示空間之規劃過程讓學生了解規劃的基礎概念及空間設計之實務，以達到展示之最佳效果，例如施工設計、色彩、照明、空間結構、展示佈置以及櫥窗設計等展示效果。
description.en: This course develops the students understanding of the exhibition design process and practical experience such as lighting, coloring, space structure, arrangement and construction, and show window design.

notes: 工設三與創意三合開(家室組)

description.zh:
探討木材之物理及機械性質對於家具構造與製造品質之影響，並讓學生瞭解材料之組織構造以熟識家具用材之鑑定。終其目標在使學生認識材料進而善用材料。

介紹以木質材料為主之家具材料。內容含蓋木材之外觀特徵，組織構造，材料鑑識及其物理與機械性質對於家具構造和製造品質其間之關係等。
description.en: The macrostructure and microstructure of wood. Identification and uses of common Softwoods and Hardwoods. Physical and mechanical properties in relation to wood processing. Properties of other wood based materials such as particleboard, fiberboard, plywood, laminated wood related to their use in furniture manufacture also included.

description.zh:
(一)嘗試引導同學作相關設計研究，探索符合社會、人文的設計策略，以國際消費者趨勢、競爭者分析、科技趨勢、國際設計研究為依據，用清晰的思路作不同的市場定位。
(二)培養同學觀察市場，了解資訊。以一設計師應有能力，發展出利基性產品的關鍵性因素分析報告。並探索不同族群之消費行為分析，作為加速產品開發流程及建立利基性產品之依據，可爭取商機及最大利潤。
(三) 每位同學需完成團隊分析報告，與授課老師指定之其他作業。
description.en: This course aims to help students to develop analysis skills on design trends in global context, including the sensibility and judgment of design style, design service, and design industry. Assignments include case studies other required reports.

description.zh: 讓學生學習電腦2D與3D軟體之技能，俾能應用於工程製圖，並配合其他各種參數式3D與材質編修電腦軟體之整合。
description.en: The study of 2D and 3D computer software which could be applied to the engineering drawing, and the integration with parametric 3D and materials edit computer software.

description.zh: 講授透視圖的基本原理、種類與方法及透視陰影,並以設計實例透視圖練習應用,培養靈活應用透視圖法於設計表達。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and skills of perspective drafting by specifically introducing perspective theories and ways of drawing, and being concurrent with the practice of drawing in industrial design.

description.zh: 生活空間設計實務與管理訓練。課程主旨在於培養學生對於室內設計實際工務執行與專案管理之能力，尤重： 1. 施工與估價, 2.室內設計技術規範兩大議題。其中，施工與估價部分強調設計者對於室內設計工程管理之了解，並熟練室內工程之成本分析及數量計算之方法與要點。室內設計技術規範部分則強調設計者應有的對於室內裝修設計與工程相關法規的掌握，如：建築法(與室內裝修有關的部份)、建築技術規則(與室內裝修有關的部份)、建築物室內裝修管理辦法(最主要的)、公寓大廈管理辦法、消防法、勞工安全衛生管理辦法、各類場所消防安全設備設置標準、公共工程品質管理辦法、營造業法、廢棄物清潔管理辦法等。
description.en: Training in the management and the practice of an interior design project. The course aims to equip students with the competence of managing a design project from ideality to reality that stresses especially two sections: 1. the construction and the estimation, and 2. the codes and regulations for the practice of an interior design project. The first section aims to acquaint the student with the management skill of construction, and the techniques of pricing the project including materials, labor, overhead and the administrative expenses. The second section is to enable students to understand and apply the codes and regulations for interior decoration and construction. For example, Building Code (the articles concerning interior decoration), Building Technical Regulations(the articles concerning interior decoration), Regulations for the Management of Building Interior Decoration and Repairs(the primary), Apartment Building Regulations, Fire Act, Labor Safety and Health Law, Standard fo

notes: 工設三四與創意三四合開(家室組)

description.zh: 學習邏輯思考的目的在於幫助我們培養一種邏輯能力，使我們能夠邏輯理性地以語言進行思考。要達成上述目的，我們首先要了解語言做為一種符號的內在邏輯架構。我們要明白什麼是概念、與概念所指涉的對象、與概念具備的意義和觀念；然後，語句的性質，包含其真假值，它們與字詞和概念的關係。之後，如何用語句去建構論證。為了建構論證，我們要學習傳統的歸納法、三段論法、自然演繹法的基本推論規則與自然語言和形式語言之間的翻譯。總之，我們要會在生活中如何理性地思辨問題並有效地與他人溝通。課程講授將配合一些心理測驗、課堂遊戲與電影教學。
description.en: The purpose of learning “Logical Thinking” is to help us acquiring a kind of ability in virtue of which we will be able to think logically and rationally.  To achieve that goal, we need to know the innate logical structure of our language.  That means, we will need first to grasp the essence of concepts including their reference, meaning, and ideas. Then, we shall study the essence of sentences including their truth-value and the relations with words and concepts.  After that, we shall learn how to establish a sound argument. For that purpose, we plan to study induction, syllogism, basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in quantificational logic, and translation between natural and formal language.  In a word, we will be able to speculate problems in our life rationally and communicate with others effectively.   The lecturing of the course will mix with psychological texts, games and practices in the classroom, and scientific films or regular movies.

description.zh: 為培育學生瞭解當前財務金融之實作能力，透過實驗室建置的財金模擬競賽環境，以培養學生建立其財務管理、金融市場與機構、風險管理及公司治理之實務決策能力。進一步訓練學生通過國際與國內相關的財務金融專業證照考試，以期達到理論與實務充份接軌之目標。
description.en: To nurture students to understand the practical skills of the current financial market, through the financial simulation laboratory, students build their decision-making ability of financial management, financial market and institutions, risk management and corporate governance. Further training students to obtain international and domestic financial professional certification exams in order to achieve the goal of seamless integration of theory and practice.

description.zh: 本課程主要在介紹企業的管理系統如何有效的計畫、設計和分析及實行，包括管理系統的分析、可行性研究、系統設計、系統發展、雛形設計、測試、文件製作和評估等。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to provide the students with a broad understanding of information systems, information technologies, information systems development and management in business and other organizations.

description.zh: 本課程為一理論與操作兼具之課程，目的為培養修課學生對於故事力之應用，尤其是於文化與創意產業方面。課程中將以媒體之生態與相關產業作為重心，輔以國際案例與趨勢，探討文化與創意如何展現，以及轉化為產業之關鍵為何。透過敘事分析，學生可以了解文化之脈絡為何延伸與擴散，以利用課堂教學、專題演講與部分實作演練，培養學生人文、產業、創意乃至於科技應用之跨領域思考能力，並為下學期人文與數位之實務應用實習奠下基礎。
description.en: The aim of the course, which is conducted with theories and practices, is to lead the students to comprehend the application of storytelling, especially in the cultural and creative industry. We will focus on the ecosystem of media with related industries, and the international cases or trends will also be introduced during the class, on the purpose for investigating that how the culture and creativity were exhibited and converted into industries. During the class, seminar and the practices, the students will understand how the sequence of culture extending and spreading. The ability of interdisciplinary thinking for humanism, industries, creativity and the application of technology of students will cultivated, and they will be ready to the practical course for interdisciplinary application of humanism and digital technology next semester.

description.zh: 人類在遠古時代，就有採集或遊耕的遷徙行動。旅行依其目的可分成宗教、商業、軍事、教育、研究與觀光休憩等種類。但是具近代意義的旅行與近代社會制度、交通建設、生活文化息息相關。其中教育、調查研究與觀光等尤其是近代旅行文化與過去最大之差異，本課程介紹近代旅行的開始、近代旅行性質與景點的變遷，並展望未來旅遊文化的發展。
description.en:
Far from ancient times, humans traveled for various purposes like religion, commerce, military, education, studies, and expedition. In recent years, the motives and meanings of travel have changed; people leave their home under the influence and needs of social systems, transportation industry, living cultures, and particularly education, research, and tourism. This course aims at  
giving an overview of the travel culture in modern times, dealing with issues such as changing attraction spots, positive and negative impacts on our societies, and how the scale and importance of travel will evolve in the future.

description.zh: 本課程涵蓋數位時代中一手檔案史料的整理與數位化過程，著重檔案資料的典藏管理與加值應用。課程目標在於培養學生的檔案智能，包括：1. 認識檔案資料類型與特性，以及數位保存的相關概念；2. 理解檔案編排分類與描述著錄等資訊組織的基本原則3. 具備檔案資料查找、評估與運用數位典藏等檔案專業素養。
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concepts and practical issues in modern archives administration. And then, focus on the long-term preservation and open access of digital archives. By attending the class students will: (1) Understand basic concepts of archival materials relating to digital preservation. (2) Gain in-deep understanding the principles of archives arrangement and information organization. (3) Possess the archival intelligence to find, evaluate and use the digital information.

description.zh:
1.廣告一定要花大錢嗎？那可不一定！
我們一起找出不花大錢，又能廣而告知的好方法吧!
2.讓學生了解各類型的廣告方式，不是只學美工而已。
3.國內外各類別優良廣告觀摩後進行創意引導與實作
4.每一小組就是一公司，我們從CI,LOGO和品牌故事開始做廣告
description.en:
1.Understand the various types of advertising methods, more than art design.
2.Every team is a company, you should design the logo and brand story with brain storming. Through practical case studies, finding the way to sell creative.
3.Watching and doing, learning more about advertising tools and use them.

description.zh:
課程目標:
透過歐、美、日及台灣傑出攝影家之專題攝影作品賞析，結合實務創作與討論。培養學生對於專題影像的認識及從事專題攝影創作之職能。
課程內容:
專題攝影概述、專題攝影作品賞析、實務創作與討論。作品賞析與討論將試圖含括地方誌型專題、人類學及社會學式專題、戰爭與事件紀錄專題、城市專題、地景式專題、編導式專題、廢墟專題，歐美近代及當代攝影家系列、東北亞漢字圈國家 (台灣、中國大陸、日本、韓國) 近代及當代攝影家系列等討論。惟需視學生創作進度適時調整。
教學方式:
各類型專題攝影作品、經典攝影集及影片賞析、課堂講授、作品創作與討論。
description.en: This course will combine the practical creation with discussion, and students can appreciate the photography from some distinguished photographers who are from Europe, the United States, Japan and Taiwan. Moreover, students will be trained to know the thematic image, and to engage in the creative photography.

description.zh: 課程主要為探討插畫意涵與設計相關表現形式。透過對物象的觀察，開發創作與設計的資源。練習插畫技法（色鉛筆，水彩，壓克力，拼貼，與軟體組合），並結合現代設計理念，發展創新的文創設計風格。熟悉媒材的表現方式與技巧，並能實驗於文創設計中。
description.en: This course mainly explores the illustrator implications associated with the design manifestations. Through observe the images, the learner can develop the creative and design resources. The learner can exercise the illustration techniques (color pencil, watercolor, acrylic, collage, and software combination); combine with modern design, the development of innovative cultural and creative design. At last, the learner will be familiar to the illustrator expressions and skills in order to develop a new experiment in cultural and creative design.

name.en: Skills and Practicum of Escorting English

description.zh: 本課程提供在各種場合中口譯的應用。如伴隨工廠參觀，出席展覽會場，開幕演說，及外賓接待，採取密集的口語演練，並訓練隨行解說的技巧。
description.en: This course provides an application of Interpretation for different occasions. These situations include a factory visit, an exhibition presentation, an opening address, a foreign-visitors reception and a banquet attendance. This course aims to build up the techniques and cultivation of Escort Interpretation through intensive oral training.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 翻譯各式文體風格之文章，賞析名家之譯作，涵括文學、科學、教育、商業等領域作品，並佐以特殊表現法及修辭法之認識及練習。
description.en: This course aims at an appreciation of various styles of translated works in such fields as literature, education, science & technology, commerce. so as to equip students with a deep insight into the usage of rhetoric and expression for particular purpose.

description.zh: 本課程以逐步口譯為主﹐深入模擬商務訪談﹐會議溝通﹐外賓接待至國際會議主持﹐隨行口譯﹐各式談判之概論與實例解說。課程注重模擬﹐演練及禮儀文化的涵養，以期訓練學生語言應對的能力及良好風度的表現。
description.en: This course focuses on Consecutive Interpretation. It simulates a commercial meeting and communication, visitors reception, international conference hosting and escort interpretation. In addition, it includes a general theory of different negotiations and examples. The course concentrates on simulation, practicum and courtesy cultivation. We expect to build up students' dialogue ability and manners.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

description.zh: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
description.en: This course, using a functionally-oriented approach, aims at increasing university-level EFL writing students' English writing skills and developing them into more fluent, confident writers. To achieve this goal, students in this course will have ample opportunities to compose a wide variety of extended writing pieces, including letters, memos, abstracts, reviews, creative writings, and technical reports.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（二）

description.zh: 本課程目的在啟發學生英語聽力，分析及思辨能力。本課程自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的新聞及媒體教材, 以訓練聽力及筆記的技巧。 此外，在課堂上將討論一些有爭議性的或者有趣的議題，以培養學生獨立思辨能力。
description.en: The course aims to develop the student's techniques of listening, analyzing and critical thinking in English. A variety of journalistic and media texts will be selected from newspapers, magazines and T.V. to reinforce listening training and note-taking skills. Besides, some controversial or interesting issues will be discussed in class to encourage the student's independent and critical thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
description.en: This course is designed to develop oral communication skills at a higher level.  Stimulating themes and authentic content will be used to engage students and generate lively conversation, such as though-provoking newspaper, magazine articles, and video films. Activities include task-based pair and small-group discussion for maximum practice and personalization.

description.zh: 本課程幫助學生習得敘述、描寫、推論、議論、省思、說明等文體方面的寫作技巧，並指導學生從閱讀、圖片、日常生活事件，及課堂討論內容中取材，以加強邏輯思考和流暢寫作能力。
description.en: This course aims to develop and reinforce students' strengths to create unified and coherent pieces of composition in a variety of styles--narrative, descriptive,  argumentative, reflective, and expository.  Students will be guided to write in response to readings, pictures, events in their daily lives, and discussions from the class.  Thought-provoking topics dealing with current issues are used to stimulate and foster critical writing strategies. This course enables students to write and discuss logically and clearly; they also need to incorporate grammatically newly-built vocabulary into their writing.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程藉由不同情境之英語錄影帶, 以及專題的語彙題目來提供一個英語談話的情境使學生能學習合宜的詞句。小組討論、角色演練、口頭報告皆為主要教學技巧，俾能增強學生之聽說能力。
description.en: This course aims at providing an English-speaking environment to allow students learn about the speaking strategies and common expressions used in different situations through viewing video films and oral practice. Small-group/pair discussion and role-playing are also parts of the methodologies.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生熟稔運用基本重要文法以寫出正確自然, 表達清晰之句子.  內容包括語法結構和錯誤分析, 例如不完整句、誤置修飾語、不連結修飾語、散漫句、錯誤平行結構、易混淆字、贅詞等常見問題。
description.en: This course is intended to provide a review of essential grammar skills as a background for students to construct sentences that convey ideas effectively and clearly.  The main content includes the correction of sentence fragments, run-on sentences, misplaced modifiers, dangling modifiers, and faulty parallelism.  Further focus is placed on varying syntactical structure, and on avoiding errors related to commonly confused words, slang, pretentious wording, cliches, and wordiness.

name.zh: 新聞英語及聽力訓練（二）

description.zh: 本課程目的在啟發學生英語聽力，分析及思辨能力。本課程自報紙，雜誌及電視選取豐富的新聞及媒體教材, 以訓練聽力及筆記的技巧。 此外，在課堂上將討論一些有爭議性的或者有趣的議題，以培養學生獨立思辨能力。
description.en: The course aims to develop the student's techniques of listening, analyzing and critical thinking in English. A variety of journalistic and media texts will be selected from newspapers, magazines and T.V. to reinforce listening training and note-taking skills. Besides, some controversial or interesting issues will be discussed in class to encourage the student's independent and critical thinking.

name.zh: 高階英文字彙習得與應用
name.en: The Acquisition and Application of Advanced English Lexical Use

description.zh:
此課程旨在協助學生建立相當於美國大學入學測驗的高階字彙，亦即相當於接受高等教育之英語系國家人士所具備的用字能力。此課程將通過故事方式介紹此類字彙，其中也包括字形學之解析。學生修習此課程後應能將高階字彙使用於正確的上下文中，因此可達成下列諸目的：
"	提昇高階字彙數量
"	加強英文閱讀能力
"	習得重要字源解析
"	避免上下文中的用字錯誤
"	提高英語表達能力
"	加強英文寫作能力
"	精進英語文溝通技巧
description.en:
This course aims to help students build a more powerful vocabulary on the SAT (the qualifying exam for US college admission) level, i.e. the level of proficiency of an educated native speaker's. Students will be introduced to the lexical use through story scenes. Morphological analysis of the words will be included in the course. At the exit of this course, students are expected to use them in their proper contexts and hence reach the following goals:
"	Develop a powerful vocabulary
"	Improve reading skills
"	Learn important word roots
"	Avoid word usage error in context
"	Become a better speaker
"	Strengthen his/her writing ability
"	Improve communication skills

description.zh:
本課程之宗旨在於讓學生全盤瞭解現代化空間資訊、掌握空間資訊自動化研究方向、提供專業擴展及實力培養、並開創研究和就業格局。課程內容包含：
一、空間資訊簡介、
二、航測及遙測概要、
三、地理資訊系統概要、
四、全球定位系統簡介、
五、數碼城市簡介。
description.en: The objective of this course is multi-fold. First of all, it offers an unique opportunity to obtain comprehensive understanding about modern geoinformatics. In this course, students will be able to gain insights into the state-of-the-art research, development, and applications in geoinformatics, especially the 3S technologies (RS, GIS, GPS) and their integrations for sophisticated applications such as cyber city implementation and applications. For engineering students, this course is also an effective platform for capacity-building and career extending. The main topics of this course include: 1) Introduction (geoinformatics at a glance), 2) Remote Sensing (remote sensing fundamentals, airborne remote sensing, and satellite remote sensing), 3) Geographic Information Systems (GIS), 4) Global Positioning System (GPS), 5) Cyber City Implementation and Applications.

notes: 土木三甲乙、四甲乙合開

description.zh: 課程內容包含：(1)緒論、(2)運輸系統規劃、(3)公路工程概述、(4)交通工程概述、(5)鐵路工程概述、(6)航空工程概述、(7)港灣工程概述。
description.en:
Integrated transportation systems from the standpoint of assembly,haul,and distribution means.Analysis of transport
equipment and traveled way.Power requirements,speed, stopping,capacity,economics,route location.Future technological developments and innovations.

description.zh: 本課程主要教授學生七大項方向1.複習矩陣學2.結構矩陣學基本概念3.勁度法觀念4.勁度法解桁架問題5.勁度法解梁問題6.勁度法解剛架問題7.程式分析實習
description.en:
The course contents are divided into 7 major topics: 1. Review the matrix theory; 2.Basic concepts of the matrix structural theory; 3. Stiffness method; 
4. Using stiffness method to solve truss problem; 5. Using stiffness method to solve beam problem; 6. Using stiffness method to solve rigid frame problem; 7. Practice of the structural analysis program.

notes: 土木三甲乙、四甲乙合開

description.zh: 本課旨在介紹各種基礎工程施工。課程摘要可分：(1)概說、(2)基礎種類、(3)基礎之支承力、(4)支承力試驗、(5)基礎開挖、(6)直接基礎、(7)樁基概說、製造、打擊之法、(8)場樁施工、穩定液泥水管理、(9)反循環鑽掘工法、(10)貝諾特工法、(11)土鑽工法、(12)預壘樁、(13)深基礎工法、(14)開口沈箱、(15)地下連續壁、(16)地錨、(17)地下構造物、(18)水平方向推進工法、(19)托底工法。
description.en: With the knowledge of Soil Mechanics and Foundation Engineering, a series of underground construction methods will be elaborated. They are slurry diaphragm wall,pile foundation (reverse,or cased),anchor system, foundation excavation,drainage system,bracing system and monitoring system etc.

description.zh: 工程地質對於工程結構物之規劃、設計、施工、維護等均有重要關係。本課程內容包括：(1)地質調查、(2)岩石之風化及其性質、(3)地下探查、(4)地球物理探測、(5)邊坡滑動與山坡、(6)建築物、結構物之基礎、(7)公路與鐵路、(8)隧道、(9)壩址地質調查。
description.en: Fundamentals of mineralogy,petrology,sedimentation,stratigraphy,and structural geology needed by environmental scientists to understant earth materials.

description.zh: 土木營造工程範圍廣泛，各種法營造工法更是不計其數，本課程教授學生幾種常見之施工法：一、土方工程：1.土壤調查2.挖方3.填方4.搬運5.軟弱地盤之處理6.土方作業計劃7.作業能力估算。二、混凝土工程：1.混凝土材料及其性質2.配比設計3.混凝土之攪料、灌置與搗實4.混凝土之養護與品質控制。三、基礎工程：1.基礎之種類2.淺基礎3.樁基礎4.沈箱5.深開挖及擋土工程6.圍堰7.灌漿。四、專項工程：1.河川工程2.海岸工程3.堰埧工程4.發電工程5.隊道工程6.橋梁工程7.港灣工程8.道路工程9.衛生下水道工程10. 鐵路工程11. 地下構造物工程12. 建築工程13. 機場工程。
description.en:
public work,improving the land and the enviorment,and preventing the harricoms.
Construction Methods includes elementary and applied methods.The purposes of this course are for students understanding the steps of various construction methods.

description.zh:
一、電腦網路概述
二、Internet
三、TANET BBS
四、Gopher
五、Unix介紹
六、Unix指令
七、Mail
八、Ftp
九、News、WWW
十、Novell Netware
description.en:
1.TANet BBS
2.NCSA Telnet
3.UNIX Concepts, Commands
4.Mail, News
5.Ptp, Archie
6.other Internet resources
7.Network hardware
8.Drivers, Network protocol
9.LAN
10.Dial up service

notes: 電機三甲乙丙合開，計網電腦教室，限50人

description.zh: 以國外設計競賽為主軸，輔導與協助學生積極的參與國內外設計競賽，訓練學生獨立思考與問題解決能力。
description.en: This course aims to focus on domestic and international design competitions, guide and help students' active, and let students have independent thinking and problem-solving skills.

description.zh: 材料科學為工程教育的重要科技，材料的性質與特性，為現代工程設計中佔有相當重要的地位，金屬材料的各種性質，都基於其內部構造的變化，其內部原子聚集成規則的結晶構造，亦或聚集成非結晶構造，其所形成的各種物理特性，由最基本的結晶構造開始了解。電子顯微鏡，破壞力學，超導性，電傳導，超塑性，動態回復，動態時效應變。差排理論、結晶核的形成與成長，合金相理論，晶界自由度，鑄造物的成核與均質化，硬化現象，固體擴散現象，破壞現象及理論，潛變的形成與原因等，充分了解金屬材料特性上的理論基礎與變化軌跡。
description.en: Properties and characteristics of materials play important role in modern engineering design.Each property of materials is based on its transformation at inner structure, its atoms inside converge either a regulated crystal structure or a noncrystal structure, their physical property should be understood from the most fundamental crystalline structure, such as electronic microscope, destructive dynamics, super-conductivity, electronic conductivity, super-plasticity, dynamic recovery, dynamic aging strain , dislocation theory, the formation and growth of nucleus, alloy phase theory, degree of freedom of crystal boundary , nucleation and homogenization of casting product, hardening phenomenon, solid diffusion phenomenon, destructive phenomenon and theory, creep formation and its reason, all of these make student fully understand the theory basis and change record of the metallic material characteristics.

name.zh: 車輛電力轉換系統實驗

description.zh: 本課程內容包含應用於車輛電能轉換系統的轉換器工作原理以及實驗平台建立。此外，針對新能源與車輛電力整合，本課程探討燃料電池、光伏電池、超級電容器以及先進電力電子轉換器與電動機驅動技術於車輛電力系統應用。而車輛電力系統中直流和交流配電架構的合理設計準則，也一併討論及分析。最後，針對電動車輛與智慧微電網系統整合的科技潮流，未來電動車電力系統將需要設計Vehicle-to-Grid(V2G)協助穩定電網或Vehicle-to-House(V2H)成為家用不斷電裝置系統。因此，本課程擬講授各種新型電力轉換器及電池充電器，並將其區分為隔離型/非隔離型、單向/雙向電力潮流特性之轉換器及其設計實例。
description.en: The contents of this course explore the operation principles and experimental bench setup of different converter topologies for vehicle electric conversion systems. Also, the course discuss new clean energies such as fuel cells, photovoltaic cells, super-capacitors integrated with advanced power electronic converters, and motor drive technology for the vehicle electric conversion applications. DC and AC power distribution architecture of the vehicle electric conversion system also be discussed and analyzed. Finally, corresponding to the trends of electric vehicles integrated smart micro-grid system technology; the electric vehicle power system needs the Vehicle-to-Grid (V2G) function to stabilize the grid or Vehicle-to-House (V2H) function used for household uninterruptible power device system applications. Therefore, this course will teach a variety of new power converters and battery charger with classifications of isolated / non-isolated, unidirectional / bidirectional power flow fe

description.zh: 本課程以提升學生英文能力，至全民英檢中級以上的程度為目標。教學內容以加強學生日常生活中，如：購物、旅遊、定餐等用語之溝通、運用、表達及閱讀寫作等能力為主。
description.en: The goal of this course is to help students enhance their English proficiency superior to the Intermediate Level of General English Proficiency Test. A student who completes this course will be able to perform routine daily communication such as travel, shopping, ordering a meal, etc. and will have better understanding in reading and writing.

notes: 碩士班畢業門檻，限碩士班學生修習

description.zh: 本課程講解有關生產設備投資低，雖量少，但附加價值高之精細化學品，如各種界面活性劑，添加劑，促進劑，催化劑，助劑，香料，顏料，醫藥等。並引例介紹這些化學品製程，用途，運用原理，國內外特用化學品之現況與發展。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicinals, etc.  Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discusses in this course.

description.zh: 本課程講解有關生產設備投資低，雖量少，但附加價值高之精細化學品，如各種界面活性劑，添加劑，促進劑，催化劑，助劑，香料，顏料，醫藥等。並引例介紹這些化學品製程，用途，運用原理，國內外特用化學品之現況與發展。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicinals, etc.  Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discusses in this course.

description.zh: 「生命科學與工程」課程融合生物與工程兩門學科，內容涵蓋生命科學領域（分子、細胞、組織、器官、系統、個體、行為等）及工程領域（化學、化工、材料、電子、電機、機械、土木等，以及影像、量測、模式等方法）。授課內容盡量以引發學生興趣為主，目的在使工程領域的學生能明白生命科學對工程設計的影響，以及使生物領域的學生能瞭解工程對於生命科學的幫助；兩者相輔相成，相互影響。
description.en: This course is designed for undergraduate engineering students with the objective of introducing the fundamentals of life sciences while pointing out the areas in which engineering plays a pivotal role in the advent. Students are to be provided with perspectives on the interplay between biology, engineering, and biotechnology, with emphasis on the quantitative and integrative nature of biological and bioengineering problems. The contributions of engineering to life science are illustrated with the design and manufacturing of tools essential for observations and applications in medicine, agriculture and environment.

description.zh: 所謂再生醫學主要是利用健康細胞來製作具有功能與生命性之身體器官組織，用於修復或是替換身體內，因為老化、生病、受損所造成之不健康的器官與組織。其次，亦可以其他的方式，例如利用體內藥物釋放等方式來刺激體內組織或是器官再生之方法。其所涉及的領域廣泛至所有之醫療方式。內容將主要以幹細胞與組織工程學為基礎，因應臨床醫療需要為導向，結合材料工程、細胞生物學以及基因工程等科學探討此一應用科學。本課程內容將以深入淺出方式討論醫療相關的尖端技術及未來發展之趨勢。同時，結合幹細胞、組織工程與再生醫學之基本概念知識介紹許多再生醫療相關生技產品。
description.en: Regenerative medicine refers to the use of healthy cells to produce the functioning of the organs or tissues, and repair or replaces the aged and damaged organs or tissues. In addition, it can also be applied directly to in vivo models, for example, to stimulate the tissue or organ regeneration by drug release. Regenerative medicines cover a wide range of medical care. In this course, we will mainly focus on stem cells and tissue engineering based on clinical needs –oriented, we combine materials engineering, cell biology, genetic engineering and other related knowledge explore this issue. Meanwhile, the course will also introduce the knowledge of stem cells, the basic concepts of tissue engineering and many regenerative medical-related biotechnology products.

notes: 化工三甲乙丙合開,初選人數上限30人

description.zh: 本課程目標為提升學生英文之閱讀能力與聽力。包含增加英文單字數量，科技論文文法、句型、結構等特質，及訓練聽力習慣。
description.en: This course aims to enhance the English language skills for engineering students who are preparing for their career advancement in the industry field or business enterprise. The study includes English reading, listening, speaking, writing, comprehension, grammar rules, vocabulary enlargement, pronunciation, conversation, business communication, and professional presentation skills. Oral English speaking will be primary used in the class with interactive mode. The course materials will utilize multiple resources: Cambridge University textbooks, videos, audios, power point, handouts, business reports, newspaper articles, magazines, and English learning websites.

notes: 化工三甲乙丙合開,初選人數上限30人【停開】

description.zh:
介紹高分子物理、化學及光電等性質，並且回顧及展望高分子在生化、醫學及光電產業的應用。
1. 高分子物理及化學性質
2. 高分子光電特性
3. 功能性高分子
4. 液晶高分子
5. 薄膜技術與應用
6. 生醫材料及高分子藥物
7. 高分子導體及半導體
8. 光電用高分子
9. 高分子電池
10. 高分子LED
description.en: The course introduces the fundamental principles and applications of polymers. It covers the following topics: physical and chemical properties; electrical and optical characterizations; functional polymers; liquid crystalline polymers; membranes; biomaterials; polymers for photonic and electronics; conductive and semi-conductive polymers; polymers for batteries; and polymeric LED.

notes: 化工三甲乙丙合開,初選人數上限30人

description.zh: 依藥理作用上之分類，介紹其名稱( 包括處方常用名稱) ，化學結構，性狀，合成方法，藥物代謝( 吸收，循環路徑及作用器官或組織) ，藥理反應，適合之醫療症狀使用劑量，中毒及解毒劑，配合禁忌等。
description.en: This course describes the classification of the medicinesincluding their trade names, or those generally prescribed; the chemical structure and their related characteristics; methodology of sythesis and preparation; fate of drugs (involving absorption, circulation and their target organs or tissues); pharmacological aspects; method of indications; intoxication and detoxication as well as their incompatability.

notes: 化工三甲乙丙合開,初選人數上限30人

description.zh: 有機化合物的製備、分離、純化及鑑定。實驗技術加強重點在減壓蒸餾、液相色層分析、光譜分析（IR、NMR、UV）及惰性環境的反應。
description.en: Preparation, isolation , purification and identification of organic compounds techniques such as vacuum distillation, liquid chromatography, spectroscopic analysis, and inert atmosphere conditions are emphasized.

description.zh: 有機化合物的製備、分離、純化及鑑定。實驗技術加強重點在減壓蒸餾、液相色層分析、光譜分析（IR、NMR、UV）及惰性環境的反應。
description.en: Preparation, isolation , purification and identification of organic compounds techniques such as vacuum distillation, liquid chromatography, spectroscopic analysis, and inert atmosphere conditions are emphasized.

description.zh: 由於石油短缺、汙染嚴重，乾淨的綠色能源發展，一直是全世界亟需努力的目標。本課程將針對太陽能電池、水分解等綠色能源作介紹，讓學生更了解世界於綠能的發展與趨勢，進而激發其願意提出想法投身相關產業的動機。本課程也將訓練學生查資料上台報告的能力，加深其對綠色能源的認知。
description.en: Due to the shortage of gasoline and serious pollutions, the development of the green energy is the most important issue for the whole world. This course will introduce the solar cells, water splitting systems, and other green energies. The main goal is to help students understand the development and direction of the green energies in the world, and further inspire their motivation to join the related industries. This course will also train students the ability to search and report, and further to learn more about the green energies.

notes: 化工二甲乙丙合開,初選人數上限55人

description.zh: 有機化合物的製備、分離、純化及鑑定。實驗技術加強重點在減壓蒸餾、液相色層分析、光譜分析（IR、NMR、UV）及惰性環境的反應。
description.en: Preparation, isolation , purification and identification of organic compounds techniques such as vacuum distillation, liquid chromatography, spectroscopic analysis, and inert atmosphere conditions are emphasized.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：1.電磁波光學2.高斯光束3.共振腔理論4. 原子輻射5.雷射與放大器原理7.雷射特性 8.雷射的應用
description.en: This course introduces: 1. Electromagnetic Optics 2.Gaussian Beams 3.Optical resonators 4.Atomic radiation 5.Principles of lasers and amplifiers 6. General characteristics of lasers 7. Laser applications

notes: 四光四與光電所合開，億光1115會議室上課

description.zh: (1)輻射度學與光度學基本參數介紹-流明、燭光、勒克斯、尼特 (2)光的量測-總光功率量測、光強角分布、光譜量測、色溫量測、演色性量測 (3)配光曲線與照明簡單範例計算 (4)室內照明標準與照明規畫 (5)道路照明與CIE道路照明標準 (6) Dialux照明專用軟體介紹 (7) Dialux室內照明設計實例 (8) Dialux道路照明設計實例(9) Dialux體育場照明設計實例(10) Dialux景觀照明設計實例
description.en: (1)Radiometry and Photometry-lm,cd,lux,nit(2)Light Measurement-Total flux,Intensity distribution,spectrum measurement,CCT,CRI (3) Luminaries Angular profile and design example(4) Interior illumination standard(5) CIE Road lighting standard (6) Introduction to Dialux software (7) Case study: Interior Lighting Design Using Dialux(8) Case study: Road Lighting Design Using Dialux (9) Case study: Stadium Lighting Design Using Dialux (10) Case study: Landscape Lighting Design Using Dialux

notes: 四光四、光電所與最後一哩合開，(億光935)

name.zh: 半導體薄膜特性與製程
name.en: Properties and Fabrication Techniques of Semiconductor Thin

description.zh: 本課程將介紹：(1)半導體之晶格結構與能帶理論，(2)半導體物理特性，(3)半導體光學特性，(4)薄膜結構及特性(包括表面、介面、量子井、超晶格與奈米尺度的特性)，(5)發光二極體及半導體雷射原理，(6)真空系統，(7)薄膜沉積技術，(8)磊晶及摻雜，(9)應用在光電領域的半導體薄膜材料。
description.en: This course introduces (1)the crystalline structures and energy band theory of semiconductors, (2)physical properties of semiconductors, (3)optical properties of semiconductors, (4)thin film structures and properties (including surface, interface, quantum well, superlattice, and nano-scale films), (5)fundamentals of LED's and semiconductor lasers, (6)vacuum system, (7)thin film deposition techniques, (8)epitaxy and doping, (9)semiconducting thin film materials in the electro-optical applications.

notes: 四光四與光電所合開(億光1035)

description.zh: 指導學生進行研究專題，以培其實務的能力，學生必須選一實務專題，由本系教師指導，在畢業前完成成品製作，且需有書面報告。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers.Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instrution's to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or sofetware and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

notes: 須先修過實務專題(一)，及繳交指導教授同意書始能修習

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh:
本課程在使學生瞭解生產的物品或提供的服務能適時適地，並以最少的成本送到顧客手中。
本課程之內容如下：
  1.物流管理和策略
  2.運輸和配送
  3.保管與包裝
  4.定單處理
  5.採        購
  6.物料搬運
  7.物流成本
  8.物流服務
  9.資訊系統
10.物流生產力衡量
description.en:
The aim of the course is to help the students understand how to perform logistics activities so as to make products and services available to customers at the time place,and in the condition and from desired in the most profitable or cost-effective way.
The content of the course discription:
  1.Transpor totion
  2.Inventory maintenance
  3.Order processing 
  4.Purchasing 
  5.Warehousing & packaging
  6.Materials handling
  7.Logistics costs
  8.Logistics customer serrice
  9.productivity meajurement

description.zh: 本課程係探討纖維製品在非衣著終端領域之應用，例如電子電機，土木，材料，生醫，航空與車輛工程等之應用。其內容包括功能性與機能性纖維、複合紗、複合織物、編帶、非織物、纖維系複合材料與電線電纜、光纖電纜等之製造方法、原理與其終端應用領域。最後將討論微細加工技術與微細粉末在纖維與高科技工業上之應用。
description.en: The course is to interpret the application of the non-apparel textiles at the different end uses, such as application in electrical and electronic, civil, material, biomedical, aerospace, and vehicle engineering etc.  It includes fabrication methods, principles, and end application fields of the performance and functional fibers, composite yarns, composite fabrics, braid, nonwoven, textile composites, and cables and optical cables etc.　Finally, the micro processing technology and powder in textile and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程針對紡織產業創新技術議題與實務操作，安排演講及工廠參訪實習，邀請跨領域之企業講師進行紡織工業技術演講，包括機能性纖維研發與應用、環保染整助劑、功能性織物、高強力纖維織物及塑膠回收再生製品開發等相關創新技術進行講演。除了課程中安排學生到相關紡織產業工廠實地見習。
description.en: The course is to introduce the trends and the characteristics of textile industries in the new millennium. This course will invite well-known entrepreneurs and experts to share their success stories and new technology with the students.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹細胞培養與基因工程之方法與應用。課程內容涵蓋微生物、植物、昆蟲及動物細胞之介紹，細胞生長與代謝，細胞培養方法，生物反應器，基因工程技術與應用實例。
description.en: The purpose of the course is to introduce the technology of cell culture and genetic engineering. The topics include: (1) introduction of microbial, plant, insect, and mammalian cells (2) cell metabolism and growth (3) cultivation of cells in bioreactors (4) fundamentals of genetic engineering (5) application examples.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹微生物及其應用，學生將可習得何謂微生物，微生物如何運作，以及微生物的應用。課程內容包括: (1)微生物的分類、型態、結構及一般特性; (2)微生物的生長與控制; (3)微生物的生理與代謝; (4)微生物的應用，例如生物轉換、一次及二次代謝產物的生產、基因重組蛋白的生產、核酸藥物的生產等。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the major concepts, principles and applications of microbiology. Students will learn about what microorganisms are, how they function, and their industrial applications. The course include the following topics: (1) Classification and structures; (2) Microbial growth and control; (3) Microbial physiology and metabolism; (4) Applications, such as biotransformation, production of primary and secondary metabolites, production of recombinant proteins, etc.

description.zh: 本課程主要著重於讓學生瞭解在日常生活中，食衣住行育樂等活動與化學之相互關係。尤其對在生活中所接觸之食品、衣著、環境與用品應有所認識，並以化學觀點了解其與人體之關係。此課程主要內容包括(1)食品化學(Food Chemistry)，(2)衣著化學 (Cloth Chemistry)，(3)環境化學(Environmental Chemistry)，(4)核化學(Nuclear Chemistry)，(5)水化學 (Hydrochemistry)，(6)界面化學 (Interface Chemistry)，(7)家庭用化學品 (Household Chemicals)，(8)化粧品學(Cosmetic Chemistry)，(9)電化學 (Electrochemistry)
description.en: This course focuses on chemistry related to People`s Livelihood, including: Food Chemistry, Cloth Chemistry, Environmental Chemistry, Nuclear Chemistry, Hydrochemistry, Interface Chemistry, Household Chemicals, Cosmetic Chemistry, and Electrochemistry. Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of People`s Livelihood chemicals are also discussed in this course.

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010或負責教授同意。晶體結構、鋼之變態、相平衡原理、退火與正常化、淬火與回火、表面硬化處理、構造用鋼、工具鋼、其它鋼料及鑄鐵之熱處理。
description.en:
The contents of this course can be categorized as followings: 
1. fundamental metallographic concepts.
2. The effects of alloying elements in steel.
3. Hardenability 
4. General heat treatment processes: annealing, hardening, tempering, and normalizing. 
5. Special heat treatment process : tool steels hardening and tempering. Quenching and tempering of constructional steels, case hardening, nitriding, carbonitriding, induction hardening, and flame hardening.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。以數個實例說明生產製造的方法，從一個新產品開發到設計安排及製作生產設備，一系之過程解決方法，讓同學了解一個產品的開發、製程的安排生產設備的改善、及其他相關事務的配合等問題。以達到同學到工廠能有系統的解決生產製造問題。
description.en: Required courses before taking this course must be permitted by the professor who teaches this course. There will be examples to illustrate and describe the production methods. Starting from the development of a new product, the course will introduce all process and solution ways of design , manufacture and production, so that the students are able to understand the development of products and their arrangement of manufacture and production equipment. It is our expectation that all graduated students who have taken this course are able to handle the related techniques in industries.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機器人簡介、齊次轉換矩陣、運動方程式及反運動方程式、軌跡規劃、機器人動力學、機器人控制系統、機器人程式語言、機器人於工業界之應用技術。
description.en: Introduction to Robotic Manipulators, Homogeneous Transformations, Kinematic Equations and Solutions, Trajectory Planning, Dynamics and Control of Robots, Programming and Applications.

notes: 機械四甲乙丙合開 一般教室 綜科327 限24人

name.zh: 塑膠射出模具CAE模流分析
name.en: Mold-flow analysis of plastic injection mold CAE

description.zh:
(1) 瞭解CAE網格概念與建構，將以國內開發的模流分析軟體Moldex-3D作為教學實
       習的內容：(2)流動分析，即熔膠充填狀態；(3)保壓分析，分析模內壓力分佈狀態；(4)
       冷卻分析，關於模內溫度分佈；(5)翹曲分析，分析成形品的變形。
description.en: (1) To realize mesh concept and construct the mesh. (2) Flow analysis of melt plastic filling. (3) Packing analysis of pressure distribution in the mold. (4) Cooling analysis of temperature distribution in the mold. (5) Warp analysis of injection molding parts.

notes: 四機三乙與最後一哩合開，限30人綜科328-1

name.zh: 塑膠射出成形與模具實務
name.en: Plastic injection molding and mold practices

description.zh:
(1)塑膠材料種類、特性、及其應用；(2)塑膠的成形方法；(3)塑膠射出成形品設計；(4)
   射出成形機的分類與規格；(5)射出成形模具的機構；(6)射出成形模具零件規格與選用；
  (7)成形品的缺陷與對策。
description.en: (1) Plastic materials types, characteristics, and applications. (2) Forming methods of plastic materials. (3) Part design of injection molding. (4) Classification and specification of injection molding machine. (5) Mechanism of injection mold. (6) Injection mold's parts and part selection. (7) Defects and strategy.

notes: 機械三乙與最後一哩合開，限50人

description.zh: 先修課程: 負責教授同意。本課程目的在介紹蓬勃發展中的微機電系統(micro-electro-mechanical systems, MEMS)工程與最新應用。其內容包括 : MEMS之概念與特性、微觀設計原則、跨領域模擬分析、加工材料分類、主要製程技術介紹、CMOS-MEMS整合製造、封裝與測試技術、微感測器與微致動器、智慧型元件與SOC、工程應用實例介紹
description.en: The course contents include concept and characteristics of MEMS, principles of micro system design, inter-disciplinary simulation and analysis, materials for MEMS, main-stream MEMS processing technologies, CMOS-MEMS process integration, package and test techniques, micro sensors and actuators, smart devices and SOC, and closure with a number of engineering applications.

description.zh:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
生物力學基礎，基本應用力學與生物力學之異同，生物力學之靜力學原理與應用，生物力學之運動學原理與應用，生物力學之動力學原理與應用，生物力學之材料力學原理與應用。
description.en: Principles and Applications of Statics in Biomechanics, Principles and Applications of Kinematics in Biomechanics, Principles and Applications of Dynamics in Biomechanics, Principles and Applications of Mechanics of Material in Biomechanics.

notes: 機械三甲乙丙合開；限30人

description.zh:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
本課程主要介紹幾何光學與Coherent光學兩部份之基本概念與應用﹐提供機械領域的學生有關光的知識﹐讓機械領域的學生有能力加入機光電技術整合。本課程首先介紹幾何光學﹐幾何光學雖然簡單﹐卻是光學應用最普遍的知識﹐接著進入Coherent光學原理與應用介紹﹐Coherent光學在光量測技術部份佔了非常重要的地位﹐透過本課程的訓練﹐學生將可更順利的進入光學實驗室工作﹐當然﹐本課程也適合其他對光學有興趣的學生來修習。
description.en: The lectures in this course include two main parts, the geometrical and the coherent optics. Due to the future high technology, the optomechatronics, needs the cooperation of knowledge among the optics, the electrics, and the mechanics. This course gives the students of mechanical engineering the chance to participate in this work group. The lecture will first show the students the geometrical optics which is simple but important in the field of optical application. The coherent optics is the main part in this course which occupies the most optical technique of measurement. After the course the students should have the enough knowledge to work in the optical laboratory. Certainly, this course is also useful for all students who are interest in the area of the optics.

description.zh: 先修課程：機動學(機構學)、計算機(電腦)程式語言概論、機構運動分析(位置、速度及加速度分析的解析法)、連桿組傳遞角與機械利益的分析、凸輪機構運動分析、壓力角與曲率半徑的分析、齒輪組動力傳遞分析、機構的電腦模擬、機構個案分析。
description.en: Introduction, Kinematic analysis of mechanism(Analysis of Displacement, Velocity and Acceleration by Analytical method), Transmission Angle and Mechanical Advantage of Linkage, Kinematic Analysis, Pressure angle and Profile's Curvature of Cam, Power Flow Analysis of Gear Trains, Computer Simulation of Mechanisms, and Case Study of Mechanism.

notes: 機械三甲乙丙合開 限25人

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

description.zh: 先修課程: 負責教授同意。1.數位影像基礎，2.空間域影像強化，3.頻域影像強化，4.影像還原，5彩色影像處理，6形態學影像處理，7.影像分割，8. 影像壓縮，9.機器視覺系統。
description.en: 1. Fundamental digital image, 2. Image enhancement in the spatial domain, 3. Image enhancement in the frequency domain, 4. Image restoration, 5. Color image processing, 6. Morphological image processing, 7. Image segmentation, 8. Image compression. 9. Machine vision system.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之Pro/E 3D CAD繪圖能力。課程內容包含：Pro/E基本操作、實體與曲面之設計、曲線之設計、特徵之建立及零件之編輯、曲面及曲線之編輯、Pro/E造型設計、Pro/E工程製圖。
description.en: This course is to enhance the student’s capacity of Pro/E 3D CAD drawing. The course contents including: Pro/E basic operation, solid and curve surface design, establish the characteristics and edit the part, edit the curve surface and curve line, Pro/E modeling design, Pro/E engineering drawing.

notes: 限四機一乙預選，不開放外班選課，限40人綜科328-1

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(四)

description.zh: 「全民國防」單元，主要論述國家意識及全民防衛的概念、內涵與重要性，並介紹國防與經濟、文化、心理的關聯，讓學生理解國防事務其實與生活息息相關，加強全民國防意識，增進對國家的認同。軍事訓練課目：軍人禮節及警衛勤務、軍紀教育（含申訴制度）、軍法教育、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In Civil Defense, the object is to let students are aware that national defense affairs are closely related to their daily life, enhance their consciousness of all-out defense, and promote their national identity through discussing the concept, profound meaning, and importance of national consciousness and all-out defense, as well as introduces the connection between national defense, economy, culture and psychology.
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Courtesy and Security Services, Military Discipline (including Military Petition System), Military Law Education, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

notes: 停開，請改加選有開課班級【停開】

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構,探討的主題包括: ADT(抽像資料型態)及複雜度, 靜態結構與儲存表示, 陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序, 搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

name.en: Introduction to RFID and its application

description.zh: Radio frequency identification (RFID)是一種先進的自動辨識技術。它用於辨別、追蹤、排序和確認各式各樣的物件，包含有人、汽車、包裹、動物和貨物等等。相關的應用如門禁管理、車輛辨識、資產追蹤、存貨控制、動物晶片和工產自動畫。RFID依靠標籤和讀取器之間無線電波的頻率、電波，來進行辨別。本課程將介紹RFID之基本原理及其生活與產業上之應用。
description.en: Radio frequency identification, or RFID, is a generic term for technologies that use radio waves to automatically identify individual items. There are several methods of identifying objects using RFID, but the most common is to store a serial number that identifies a product, and perhaps other information, on a microchip that is attached to an antenna. In this course, the basic technology of RFID and its application will be introduced.

name.en: Introduction to RFID and its application

description.zh: Radio frequency identification (RFID)是一種先進的自動辨識技術。它用於辨別、追蹤、排序和確認各式各樣的物件，包含有人、汽車、包裹、動物和貨物等等。相關的應用如門禁管理、車輛辨識、資產追蹤、存貨控制、動物晶片和工產自動畫。RFID依靠標籤和讀取器之間無線電波的頻率、電波，來進行辨別。本課程將介紹RFID之基本原理及其生活與產業上之應用。
description.en: Radio frequency identification, or RFID, is a generic term for technologies that use radio waves to automatically identify individual items. There are several methods of identifying objects using RFID, but the most common is to store a serial number that identifies a product, and perhaps other information, on a microchip that is attached to an antenna. In this course, the basic technology of RFID and its application will be introduced.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

notes: 上課時間為二(1、2)，科研234教室

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。

notes: 上課時間為二(1、2)，四教303教室

description.zh: 本科目將由認識地球上太陽能之基本熱輻射理論，結合各種不同形式之太陽能源有效利用裝置，討論太陽能之有效利用方式及相關系統技術。以期在既有太陽能利用技術上，發揮更有效率的太陽能源工程系統設計，奠定未來21世紀太陽能源利用之高效率化基礎。
description.en:
The aim of this course is to discuss three individual topics of more specialized nature: large PV systems, photo-voltaic under concentrated sunlight and the hydrogen economy. After completing this course the students should be able to:
1. Understand the specific features of large PV systems, an    examine their economic and technical characteristics.
2. Explain the advantages and disadvantages of concentrator    PV systems, and discuss their operation.
3. Analyze the structure of the hydrogen economic and show    its feasibility and future
   potential.

description.zh: 本課程介紹熱能交換原理與熱交換相關之工程技術。內容包括：熱交換器之基礎原理、熱交換器之分類與應用、熱交換效率分析、熱傳增強技術、散熱鰭片效率與形狀分析、各種熱交換器之設計與計算。
description.en: Introduction to the principles and the technology of heat exchangers.  The subjects include: fundamentals of heat exchangers, classifications and applications of heat exchangers, analysis of heat exchanger effectiveness, heat transfer enhancement techniques, fin efficiency and fin shape analysis, design and calculation of various types of heat exchangers.

description.zh: 泰勒多項式，求根法，數值微分與積分，差分式，誤差分析，矩陣分解，微分方程數值解，數值解軟體應用
description.en: Taylor series, equation solving, numerical differentiation and integration, difference equations, error analysis, matrix equation solving, solving differential equations, numerical code application

description.zh: 介紹產品設計初期形成設計策略所必需了解的美學、機能及工程等因素，並講授產品分析之基本理論與方法。藉由實際案例的說明與練習使學習者體會產品分析之方法並討論分析結果之意涵。
description.en: This course aims to provide the student with theories and methods of product analysis, which is one of the major sources of understanding the design of esthetic, functional and engineering details in one specific product group. Case study will be carried out with implication of the results discussed followed by practical exercise in analysing a specific group of product.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: In first semester, Senior students can choose to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. When they are finishing the course that can get the credit, also can account in graduate credit.  For Senior level, Classes are giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技四年級上學期實施選修專項分組教學，課程修畢有一學分並計入畢業學分內。由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

description.zh: 空調設計基礎、空調冷暖負載計算、空氣線圖應用分析、主要設備規範擬定、空調系統規劃與設備選用分析、風管工程設計、水配管工程設計、設備配置與裝設工程、材料與成本分析、節約省能規劃設計。
description.en: Fundamentals of HVAC system design, cooling/ heating load estimation, analysis of applied psychometrics charts, schematic design of HVAC system, main equipment selection, main equipment specification, air duct & water piping system design, equipments layout & installation, materials & cost analysis. HVAC's energy saving & energy efficient planning.

description.zh:
21世紀雲端大數據快速運算，與有線無線高速傳輸的「雲通世代」，已帶領人類從工業量產的工業經濟時代，經由知識經濟，體驗經濟，進入了產業服務化，服務產業化，以顧客價值為道向的服務經濟時代。
使用者體驗導向設計，與設計思考，己成為今日工業與企業經營教育重要的一環。
本課程將以美國史丹佛大學D--School「設計思考」(Design Thinking) 的訓練模式為主軸，輔以左右腦活用的「創造力發展原理」，加上服務經濟時代，「服務設計思考」（Service Design Thinking) 組成本創意與創新思維課程內容。
description.en:
In today's could big data calculation and high speed communication Era,  the changing of Social、economic、and technology，Forces human being has to transfer ，from mass production Industrial economic（Hard wear oriented)，trough knowledge economic 、experience economic， to today's customer oriented service economic（Soft wear oriented)。

Human Centric Design & design thinking will be one of the key factor for today's industry and management Education。

This course will base on the material and approach developed from Stanford D--School，and coop with creative engineering and the service design thinking，to form a Creative & innovation design theory and and project practice program。

notes: 創新所與工設四最後一哩合開，限15人

name.zh: 創新講座－產品/服務創新實務(二
name.en: Innovation Lecture - product and service innovation Practice

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產業專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創產品與服務創新策略之實例教學，策劃符合技術發展企業「整合跨領域資源與知識」經營體質，並滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品及服務，使學術與產業互動交流縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course through lectures and conferences with industry experts, will also teach about existing cases of product and service innovation practice. aim to teach about solving the problem of economic development of Taiwan through the way and method of innovation design; and to plan out the “Integration of interdisciplinary resources and knowledge” operating conditions fitting with technology development enterprise and products according needs of markets and users. This course also aims to increase interactivities of academic and industry.

notes: ABC節6週，工設二三四年級、創新所與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 使學生了解台灣廚具產業概況，廣泛邀請廚具業師講述廚具產業相關商品研發、設計、製造、銷售、服務等知識，並進行實務參訪，以作為進入廚具產業職場之就業準備。
description.en: This course introduces students the state of art of the kitchen industries in Taiwan.  In order to prepare students to work in kitchen industries, experts are invited to address issues about the design, manufacturing, sale and service of kitchen appliances.  Some field trips are also arranged.

notes: 工設四與最後一哩合開，限40人(家室組)

description.zh: １.TTL，CMOS邏輯閘之特性實習２.組合邏輯電路設計實習含：算術電路，比較器，解碼器，編碼器，多工器，解多工器等３.序向邏輯電路設計與應用：正反器，計數器，記錄器，及移位暫存器等綜合應用４.D/A和A/D之轉換與應用５.利用ASM圖之電路設計實習６.PLD設計規劃７.專題實作。
description.en: １.TTL and CMOS lab.２.Combinational logic circuit design lab.３.	Sequential logic circuit design lab. ４.D/A and A/D converters lab. ５.PLD design lab.６.Digital circuit design lab. ７.Special projects

notes: 限102學年度前入學未修或重修學生修讀，科研1222

description.zh:
本系在強調理論與實務並重的教學規劃中，隸屬建築技術體系的建築材料、構造、施工課程以五個學期分年循序漸進地建置。其中本課程為技術課程之最後一哩，整合前期授業內容之整合、亦屬工程案例之實務解析。
本門課在十八週的進度規劃下，以三個子單元形成授業的主要架構:第一單元「建築生產」:主要從近年建築產業的趨勢，講解全球化、市場需求、國土戰略、城鄉變遷等因素下，對於建築業的衝擊與因應而生的技術發展內容；第二單元「建築細部設計技術」:從建築構法計畫的角度分析各種設計性能落實於細部時如何解決聲音、照明、熱傳、空氣、水等課題；第三單元「設計/施工技術案例」：實際以本校近期新建工程(精勤樓、誠樸樓、億光大樓)為例，結合校外協力專家進行專案案例之進程與技術管理要點之分享。
description.en: N

description.zh: 本課程著重實務性訓練Pro/ENGINEER系統之操作能力，輔以幾何模型學理論說明CAD技術的發展現況。首先介紹CAD概論，說明電腦輔助設計技術的趨勢，培養學生具備現代數位產品開發概念與同步工程之意義；然後教授Pro/ENGINEER系統的各部分功能、指令操作，並以設計專題引導學生建立實務應用，強化學生的操作與應用能力。
description.en: Introduction of the fundamental of 3D CAD technology and the manipulation of the software packages, Pro/ENGINEER, for product design in a concurrent engineering environment. By the practical projects, the students are trained more adept skill and application experience.

description.zh:
將試作技術課程內所習之試作技術應用發揮，以產品設計圖為依據，
應用各種材料及加工技術完成產品之立體表達。
description.en:
To practice product model building techniques . 
Based on product engineering drawing , let techning design students to practice model making techniques with difference material and working methods .

description.zh:
將試作技術課程內所習之試作技術應用發揮，以產品設計圖為依據，
應用各種材料及加工技術完成產品之立體表達。
description.en:
To practice product model building techniques . 
Based on product engineering drawing , let techning design students to practice model making techniques with difference material and working methods .

description.zh: 商業與科技的日新月異乃現代生活之重要標的，本課程選讀書報雜誌中有關經貿企管等商業論述，以及科技資訊等相關文章，以討論方式，引導學生進入現代工商科技化的英語環境。
description.en: This course will guide students to read articles on technology and business from a variety of sources (books, magazines, newspapers, television scripts, etc.)  Students are required to actively participate in the speaking activities in the classroom which may involve group discussion and oral presentation of a specific topic.

description.zh: 培養正確的英語發音與腔調，並訓練學生熟悉如何使用音標記錄發音以及辨認學習者在英語發音中經常發生的問題。  課程中也介紹英語語音系統的主要規則。
description.en: This course will be concerned with English speech sounds and stress patterns, the use of phonetic symbols for transcribing pronunciation and identifying pronunciation problems. The general principles of English phonology will be introduced.

description.zh:
本堂課邀請元大寶來期貨、證券及財富管理各領域投資達人，從總經訊息剖析、產業趨勢分析、財報分析選股、期權商品策略介紹及交易實戰技巧，為台北科技大學學生分享其業界多年的寶貴心得。
財富自由是每個人所企求的，如何於在學期間培養好的投資理財觀念及交易技巧，一方面可降低未來步入職涯後財富大幅縮水的風險，另一方面或許可成為步入職場的利器，甚至可能是邁向財富自由的另一助力。
description.en:
This class is going to invite investment experts from Yuanta Futures and Yuanta Securities to teach the students by sharing their practical experience in the finance industry. The contents include macroeconomic information analysis, industry trend analysis, financial statements analysis, investment strategies of futures and warrants, as well as experience sharing of trading techniques. 
Everybody wants to achieve financial independence; therefore it is important to have the right concept of investments and trading techniques. The purpose of this course is, on the one hand, help students reduce the risk of financial loss due to lack of financial knowledge. On the other hand, for those students who are interested in financial industry, this course offers practical training and may help students to find good financial-related jobs in the future. Also, it may help students to achieve the goal of financial independence.

notes: 經管三、經管所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 全民國防教育軍事訓練(四)

description.zh: 「全民國防」單元，主要論述國家意識及全民防衛的概念、內涵與重要性，並介紹國防與經濟、文化、心理的關聯，讓學生理解國防事務其實與生活息息相關，加強全民國防意識，增進對國家的認同。軍事訓練課目：軍人禮節及警衛勤務、軍紀教育（含申訴制度）、軍法教育、愛國教育（莒光園地專題研討）。
description.en:
In Civil Defense, the object is to let students are aware that national defense affairs are closely related to their daily life, enhance their consciousness of all-out defense, and promote their national identity through discussing the concept, profound meaning, and importance of national consciousness and all-out defense, as well as introduces the connection between national defense, economy, culture and psychology.
The matched subjects of military training follow as below: Military Courtesy and Security Services, Military Discipline (including Military Petition System), Military Law Education, and Patriotic Education (specific topics digested from TV program Chu-kuang Garden).

name.zh: X光在材料分析上的應用

description.zh: X光已經成為材料結構鑑定上一項很有用的技術。這門課將介紹如何應用X光粉末繞射與吸收光譜於材料結構鑑定，以及數據分析。
description.en: X-ray has become a powerful technique on the characterization of material structures. The course will teach how to apply the x-ray diffraction and absorption on structural characterization and even analysis.

description.zh: 本課程之授課目標乃教導學生如何利用各種光譜分析方法以鑑定有機化合物之結構，包含紅外光譜、紫外線光譜、質譜儀、核磁共振光譜、X-射線光譜等。
description.en: The aim of the course is to introduce various spectroscopic methods to identify structure of organic compounds. It includes：UV spectroscopy, IR spectroscopy, NMR spectroscopy, Raman spectroscopy, Atomic  spectroscopy, Mass spectroscopy, X-ray methods, Potentiometric  methods, and Thermal methods.

description.zh:
無機化學係化學三大骨架之一，日常生活中之各樣物質大部分是由無機材料製成，課程係以深入淺出方式教授，授課內容涵蓋主族元素與過渡元素。課程內容包括:原理、主族元素化學、硼族、第1, 2, 15, 16, 17 族元素、過渡元素化學、
過渡元素、第一過渡系列元素、鈦,鉻,鈷,鎳,銅
description.en: Inorganic chemistry is one of the three frames of chemistry. Various materials in our daily life are composed of inorganic materials. This course will be given in a manner of easy-getting-point. The contents comprise of chemistry of main group elements and transition elements.  The course covers the following topics: (1) Survey of principles (2) Chemistry of main group elements (A. Boron; B. Group 1, 2, 15, 16, 17 Elements) (3) Chemistry of transition elements (A. Survey of Transition Elements; B. Elements of the first transition series; C. Titanium, Chromium, Cobalt, Nickel and Copper.

notes: 一7、8節於分子系館、四7節於計網電腦教室，限60人

description.zh: 本課程能讓學生了解各種產業相關個案研究。個案涵蓋國內外企業案例。資料來源包含哈佛大學個案、光華基金會個案、及其他相關發表之個案資料。本課程希望學生能透過此案例討論以瞭解產品實務之營運。
description.en: This course will cover the case study related to the management of all industries. The cases will be from international and local enterprise. The teaching material will be from Harvard University case, KMCC case, and other public case. The purpose this course is to provide students a practical indusyries’ scenario.

notes: 經管三、經管四與經管所合開

description.zh: 係利用物理機械整理及化學處理方式，改善紡織品之吸引性、服務性和最終用途之機能性。整理加工技術包括結構穩定性(諸如壓縮、煮呢、蒸呢、熱定型)；表面特性改質(諸如平滑性、粗糙性、光澤性及其他美觀性質)與功能性改質(諸如防縐、防縮、防火、防污、防水、防微生物與昆蟲、耐光、耐冷熱、耐污染質及化學藥劑、耐氣候、耐摩擦、抗起球、抗靜電)。
description.en: The attractiveness, serriceability and end-use performance of textiles are imporved by the application of physical mechanical and chemical processes.  Finishing techniques include dismensional stabilization(such as, sanforization, crabbing, decatizing, heat-setting),modification of surface characteristics(such as, smoothness, roughness, luster, other esthetic fabric qualities) and functional property modification (such as, resistance to wrinkle shrinkage, fire, soils and stains, water, microorganisms and insect, light, heat and cold, air pollutants and chemical agents, weathering, abrasion, pilling and static change).

name.zh: 電動車與冷凍空調系統之微處理器
name.en: Application of microprocessor on electrical vehicle and refrigerator air-conditioning system

description.zh: 本課程是應用電子學進階課程。主要重點在教授微處理器應用於電動車與冷凍空調系統，並強調以實務練習及範例設計為主的方式。本課程介紹 CANbus系統 ，使用Freescale開發的嵌入式實驗開發平台，介紹微處理器電路設計最重要的觀念，以及 ARM晶片架構與系統程式等相關重點。
description.en: This course is the advanced electronics. The main goal is to introduce the application of microelectronics on the electric vehicle and refrigerator, air conditioning system. The lectures will focus on the practice and example design. The contents include two parts. First one is the introduction of Controller Area Network (CAN, or CANbus).   Second one is the introduction of the microelectronics circuits. All the application and circuits design will be practiced on the developing board of Freescale Company.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。導論（含系統概論、資料表示法）、微電腦結構－中央處理單元、組合語言－指令型定址法、模組化程式、位元組和字串處裡、I/O 程式、DOS 功能常式、多元程式規劃、系統匯流排結構、I/O 介面、半導體記憶、多元處裡器組態。
description.en: Introduction (Overview of Microprocessor System, Data Representation), Microprocessor Architecture-CPU etc., Assembler Language-Instruction Format, Addressing Modes, Modular Programming, Byte and String Manipulation, I/O Programming, DOS Function Multiprogramming, SystemBus Structure, I/O Interface, Semiconductor Memory, Multiprocessor Configurations.

description.zh: 本課程講授參數式3D模型建模之技能，透過3D參數建模軟體將家具各零組件繪製，及組裝圖的繪製，目的在於培養學生具有數位化表達能力，以利於家具設計時造型之編修、工程檢討與設計管理。
description.en: The course is introducing the 3d modeling skill. Through learn the furniture part and assembly design drafting to develop the ability of digital design. It can take advantage of a Digital Prototyping workflow to design and build better furniture in less time.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。

Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 以視覺藝術為探討重點，研究藝術起源以及原始美術、民俗與大眾藝術分野。探究式覺元素和設計原理以及應用媒材、使用技巧，涵蓋素描、水彩、油畫、版畫、混合媒材、雕塑、建築，廣告、包裝、服裝設計、工業產品設計及攝影等。配合幻燈教學，使同學對於視覺藝術有整體性、概括性的認識，以奠定將來從事藝術鑑賞和研究創造之基礎。
description.en: The focus of this course is the exploration of visual arts.  Students will study the origin of art and the distinction among primitive art, folk and popular art. This course also provides students with visual elements, design principles, applied media material, and techniques including charcoal drawing, water-colored painting, oil painting, graphic art, compound material, sculpture, architecture, advertisement, packaging, fashion design, industrial design, and photography. Slide teaching is adopted to give students a comprehensive and general understanding on visual art in order to foster students to appreciate, study, and create art.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有深度文化視覺的科技人。從認識本土文化為起點，進而認識世界文化。引導學生如何探究文化現象，並且深入文化的精神境界，物質境界，瞭解文化價值與文化傳統，讓文化觀點充分融入個人的思維內涵。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to develop the cultural cultivation of our technology majored students. Starting with the culture of our own land and extending to world-wide culture. The teachers would guide the students to explore the phenomena of the culture, and try to find out both the spirit and the material of the culture. Through the understanding of the worth and the tradition of the culture, the students might merge the cultural cultivation into their personal thinking.

description.zh: 本課程旨在培養學生成為具有豐富文學素養的科技人。引導學生如何探索文學作品，認識各種不同類型文學作品的發展歷程，以及每個重要發展階段的寫作理念，指標作家與作品。課程中將探討東西方古今詩詞、散文、小說、戲劇等文學類型的特點，透過分析作品，解讀作品，奠立遨遊世界文學堂奧的基礎。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste of our technology majored students. The teachers would guide the students to explore the master pieces in the literary world, to know the different types of works with their development, and also the main writing theory in each period. Of course, the representative writers and their works would be introduced. During the course, regardless of the characters of western, east or ancient, modern literature, including poem, essay, novel and drama, would all be discussed. Through the internalization and reading the articles, the students might lay a foundation in the grand universal literary world.

description.zh: 本課程是為非專業學生所設計的哲學概論，介紹西洋哲學的起源、西洋哲學的問題，以及哲學與人生的關係。哲學的問題意識起自人類的自覺，人類意圖認識自己，為宇宙人生尋求解答，哲學的發生本自人類天賦的求知欲，即其本性中對於智慧的追求與愛慕。這種愛慕智慧的精神是希臘文明留給西方世界的遺產，對於知識能持客觀批判的精神，對於真理能存認真熱切的態度，對於人生能有超克苦難的修持。在國際化的世代，我們對西方的認識應更深入其精神層面，此乃本課程規劃的初衷。
description.en: This course is designed for student who is not disciplined in philosophy. As an introduction, we begin at the origin of western philosophy, the philosophical questions and finally, the relationship of human life and philosophy. Philosophy takes place when human being thinking of himself. Man by nature desire to know himself as well as the external world. And due to this love of wisdom, men can be critical to knowledge and be passionate toward truth. Eventually, grasping the sprit of western philosophy , we can view our life in quite a different view. In our time, facing the world of international, we should better understand the western culture, which is rooted in philosophy.

description.zh:
本課程首先說明人在宇宙中的定位、生命的可貴、一生的方向；接著說明如何鍛鍊自己成為生命的勇士；最後強調如何與天地萬物和諧相處和真愛的永不止息。
課程進行方式是透過體驗活動、交流分享和有次第的講授人類共同的智慧，並安排數次的校外教學，以深入瞭解社會脈動，並運用多媒體影片教學以提升學習效果，學生每天做身心觀察學習紀錄，更可以看到生命進步的軌跡。
description.en:
This course covers topics such as: the role of human beings in the universe, the dearness of life and the pursuit of life-long goals. We then discuss ways to train the students to become brave and to harmonize human beings with the nature, leading to an access to the discovery of true love.
The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

description.zh: 倫理學(Ethics)是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行(virtue)值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.

The course is realized through activity involvement, experience sharing and lectures on human wisdom. We have some extramural visits in order to understand social pulses. Multimedia teaching materials are fully utilized to enhance the teaching and learning effects. We request that all the students take note of their mental and physical improvements on a daily basis so that they could examine the progressive path of life.

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 學習邏輯推理主要的目的便是幫助我們培養一種邏輯能力，使我們能夠為我們的人生做出正確的判斷。本課程包括:邏輯的基本觀念，真值表推論法，語句邏輯中自然演繹法的18條基本推論規則，語句邏輯的基本公理系統，量化邏輯中自然演繹法的基本規論推測，量化邏輯的詮釋方法，量化邏輯的基本公理系統，語句邏輯的後設理論，量化邏輯的後設理論，傳統的三段論法，謬誤理論、與介於自然與形式語言之間的翻譯等等。
description.en: The main purpose of studying "Logical Inference" is to help us obtain a kind of logical ability, by means of which we will be able to make right choices for our life. This courses covers at least the following topics: basic ideas in logic, the truth table method, 18 basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in sentential logic, basic axiomatic systems in sentential logic, basic rules of inference in the method of natural deduction in quantificational logic, interpretations in quantificational logic, basic axiomatic systems in quantificational logic, meta-theorem in sentential logic, meta-theorem in quantificational logic, traditional syllogism, the fallacy theory, and the translation between natural and formal language, etc.

description.zh: 生態與環境保護是廿世紀的新課題，也是人類目前及未來所面臨的最大考驗。因為環境問題是超越國界的，因此環境的保護是每個人都必須瞭解的，也是每個人應盡的責任。本課程首先在了解生態環境與生活素質的關係，並了解環境污染問題的產生及其分類，再就台灣環境問題之所在分析其根源，最後了解台灣環境實施之現況後，並共同研究解決之道。
description.en: Introduction to Ecology and Environmental Protection is a brand new issue of the 20th century; also, it is the biggest challenge of all human beings and our offspring. Because environmental protection is an international issue, everyone got to realize its importance and take some action. This lesson is designed to help students understand the connection between our ecological environment and our living condition, the environmental pollution problems and their classification, the environmental problems in Taiwan, and the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems after the situation introduction.

This lesson is designed to help students understand the connection between our ecological environment and our living condition, the environmental pollution problems and their classification, the environmental problems in Taiwan, and the solution to Taiwan's environmental problems after the situation introduction.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述管理學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋四個領域：(1)瞭解管理學之理論與相關學者之研究報告；(2)討論企業界管理應用實務案例；(3)探討多國化管理之趨勢與差異(4)如何落實管理理論研討與趨勢。另外介紹現代管理相關功能實務應用案例。
description.en: The purpose of Management has four distinct objectives：(1)to introduce a new management paradigm；(2)to effectively combine the basic concepts of management and organizational behavior into a single volume, including the management functional and departmental descriptions；(3)to discuss business management applications in practice and ；(4)to effectively implement the management basic ideas. The planning, organization, decision, leadership and monitoring among variety culture will be covered and discussed in the class as well.

description.zh:
經濟學重視邏輯與嚴謹推理的理性特質是其主要特色，此亦為理工科系人之專長優勢，然而僅偏重左腦訓練的人才往往讓人覺得生冷機械，對事物看法也常過於直接而缺乏人情，若能在不失理性效率之下，兼顧以人為本之社會人文感性關懷，則經濟學自無愧為社會科學之母，其訓練目標亦與通識教育的人格均衡發展目的一致！
為避免陷入一般經濟教學因理論工具比重過高而失焦，導致學生學習興趣驟減以致成效不彰，本課程重點在於先讓學生擁有強烈之學習動機，接著認知到"確立學習目的"的重要性，藉由生活實例直接帶領學生面對並感受問題，從而引導出經濟學切入問題的思維方式，並傳授其正確可行的學習態度與方法，同時提醒學生維持對專業知識批判的精神，在嚴謹訓練架構下督促其尋求感性的意涵，因而不致陷入經濟工具與名詞的浩瀚泥沼中，從而漸進體會出經濟學之精髓。
description.en:
The science of economics is characterized by logics and cautious reasoning-at which most of the students of natural science and technology are good at. It is also a fact that those who take better advantage of the right brain are very likely to be straightforward and thus seemingly more mechanical and unsympathetic. Economics can be seen as the mother of science under the condition that rational efficiency-as well as the socially humanity--are kept at the same time. As a matter of act, the economic trainings share the same goal as what is required by the General Education courses.
The first priority of the course is to highly motivate the students in the economic issues. We do our best to avoid too much weight generally put into teaching economics, leading to poor learning and teaching experience. Cases are studied in such a way that students will recognize the "real purpose of studying."  Real cases and examples are brought into discussion. We guide the students to"feel"the problems.

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
