It  also  helps  students  to  communicate  with  other  people  in  work  place  so  as  to  establish  a  harmonic  and  cooperative  industrial  relationship .

description.zh: 唸社會哲學的主要原因在於，在社會的架構之內，從哲學的角度去探索一系列很根本的問題。它們包括﹕正義、公平、人權、自由、公民意識、市場與道德、科技與道德的關係等等。我們的探索是以哲學知識做為基礎，例如: 功利主義、康德的道德哲學、羅爾斯的正義理論，還有內格爾、多爾肯、與沈對公平理念的討論等等。由於這些問題與我們的福祉休戚相關，身為一個受過良好教育的社會公民，我們便需要具有社會哲學的知識。準此，我們可以了解社會是如何運作的，並且能夠對一些和我們個人利益乃至公共福祉相關的社會性議題進行反省，從而對它們做出正確的抉擇。
description.en: The main reason for studying Social Philosophy is that within the context of society, a number of fundamental questions can be answered from a philosophical perspective.  These include:  justice, equality, human rights, freedom, citizen consciousness, market and morality, and the relationship between technology and morality, etc. Furthermore, our investigation is based upon philosophical knowledge such as Utilitarianism, Kantian moral philosophy, John Rawls’ theory of justice, the debate of the idea of equality among Thomas Nagel, Ronald Dworkin, and Amartya Sen, etc.  Given these issues are directly relevant to our well-being and benefits, to be informed social citizens, we need to have knowledge of this subject.  Thus, we can know how the human society works, and being able to reflect upon these social issues that concern our personal interests and public welfare in an attempt of making good decisions for them.

description.zh: 創業者通常無經營企業之經驗，多數創業者在擁有很好的產品時創業，同時必須要能規劃出商業經營模式、經營規模、經營團隊、行銷策略、損益兩平點、現金流量、預期投資報酬率、資金需求、可能風險等事項，才能評估創業成功機率，設定創業經營的停損點，創業者才能提高創業的成功率。對於理工科系人員，而具有優良技術能力，且有志於創業者，本課程為增強上述人才創業素養的重要課程之一。
description.en: Entrepreneurs often do not have enterprises experience. Most of entrepreneurs start their business with very good products, at the same time, they must be able to plan out the business model, business scale, management team, marketing strategy, break-even point, cash flows, expected investment rate of return, capital requirements, possible risks and other matters, in order to estimate the probability of success and set a stop-loss point. Then entrepreneurs are more possible to succeed in their enterprise. For science and engineering personnel with excellent technical ability who want to become entrepreneurs, this course is one of the important courses to enhance the abilities for enterprise.

description.zh:
過去研究人類行為多聚焦在人類的缺陷和問題，包括攻擊性、精神疾病、非常態行為等。正向心理學開始集中在研究如何使人變得更快樂，以及生命的意義。
正向心理學的主要目標是強化人類的優勢，例如創造力、開心、心流，以及樂觀。我們應學習讓生活更正向，因為快樂會帶來更多好的工作與學業表現、社會關係，亦會使我們更長壽與健康。
description.en:
Most study of human behavior has focused mainly on what goes wrong in human affairs: aggression, mental disease, abnormal behavior, and so on. Positive psychology is centered on helping people become happier and making life most worth living.
Positive Psychology aims at enhancing human strengths such as creativity, joy, flow, and optimal performance. People have to learn how to make life more positive, because happiness leads to desirable outcomes at school and work, to fulfilling social relationships, and even to good health and long life.

description.zh: 了解國內外紡織市場與行銷策略，紡織工業之建立、紡織工業之發展過、台灣紡織與製衣工業外銷情況、世界市場紡織品之行銷策略、如何突破外銷瓶頸、如何生產附加價值高之紡織品以適合市場之需要。
description.en: The purpose of this study is to provide an international and historical perspective on the situation in the Taiwan's textile industry and from this perspective on the suggest alternative for its future development. We begin our study of marketing and discuss the facts that form the foundation for the rest of the study. (1) Economics of the global textile industry. (2) The current state of Taiwan's textile industry. (3) The evolution of competitive strategies. (4) Countermeasures for industry. Product differentiation--higher value-added product, better quality, image or superior custmoer service. Computerization--utilize computerized information network for internal management and worldwide trade communication.

description.zh: 講授電腦輔助造型設計之繪圖技巧，以Alias軟體之3D曲面特性，傳授3D surface軟體之立體造型繪圖技巧，空間概念與產品設計之應用，訓練學生以電腦繪圖達到3D造型繪製與修改的基本能力與技巧。
description.en: This course introduces the computer aided modeling design，teach students how to use Alias software building conceptual product models and creating quality surface with a comprehensive set of digital modeling 、shape、definition。

name.zh: 資訊與通訊科技在工業工程之應用
name.en: Information and Communication Technologies for Industrial Engineering

description.zh: 智慧手機、智慧車、智慧家電、智慧電網、智慧化控制系統等，一場科技革命正熱鬧展開。看似單一產品的創新，背後其實有著更大的驅動力，那就是當行動通訊與網際網路結合後，催生出來的Mobile Internet新領域，所有資料都上網、所有物品都連網、所有人都掛網，個人到企業都必須做好準備，因此，當企業在邁向資訊化與自動化的同時，工業工程系責無旁貸的需將行動運算納入考量。本課程的目標在幫助學生瞭解雲端運算在工廠上的應用，學習建構所謂服務導向的企業，以及提供進階之程式開發知識，與跨入3G最新手機開發平台，培養未來開發手機程式設計之技術實力，使學生具備獨立開發手機應用程式的能力。
description.en: This is an introduction course of mobile computing. The course is designed principally to provide the Followings topics: 1. fundamentals of mobile technology; and applications, 2. Location-based service 3. Could-based computing 4. Mobile applications; 5. Mobile programming

description.zh: 指導學生進行研究專題，以培育其研發能力。每一位學生必須經指導教授選定題目，獨立或數位同學成一組完成硬體或軟體專題，並書寫印製，經系公開展示與評分。
description.en: Teaching students to do the research work and to write the papers. Before graduation, the students have possessed the ability to do the R/D work. Each student must be through professor's instructions to select the topics of special project, personal or group work should be completed the project's hardware or software and issued the paper. An announcement has been made by the department, then get the grade and credit.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括液滲檢測法、磁粉檢測法、放射線、超音波檢測法、中子射線、全像攝影檢測法等、針對各種檢測方法之原理、可靠度、靈敏度等作探討。
description.en: Liquid-Penetrant Examination, Magnetic Particle Examination, Radiographic Examination, Ultrasonic Examination, and other less common techinques. Physical  Bases  of  Tests, Materials  to which applicable, Calibration Standards, and  Reliability.

description.zh: 先修課程:3001051或負責教授同意。參數化設計之介紹及應用、特徵基底模型之建立及組合、模型特徵之拷貝及仿造、目標導向設計之概念及應用、複雜曲面特徵之合成及修整、模型特徵從屬關係之介紹、圖層之產生及使用、模型組件之合成及修改。
description.en: Introduction and Applications of Parametric Design, Construction and Assembly of Feature Based Models, Copying and Patterning of Model Features, Concept and Applications of Design Intent, Synthesis and Triming of Complex Surface Features, Introduction to Parent-child Relationship Between Model Feature, Generation and Usage of Layers, Synthesis and Modification of Model Assembly.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機率基本觀念及數理隨機變數、工程常用的機率分佈函數、量測數據與參數估算、迴歸及相觀分析、可靠度之分析及運用、電腦模擬(蒙地卡羅)技術。
description.en: Basic Probability, Random Variables and Probability Distributions, Sampling Distribution, Maximum LikelihoodModel Fitting, Confidence Tolerance and Prediction intervals, Regression Analysis, Introduction to Monte Carlo Methods.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

name.zh: 細胞生理反應之檢測原理與技術
name.en: Principles and Techniques to Test Cell physiology

description.zh:
本課程設計著重於實務操作與原理之探討，並藉由結果現象之觀察來使學生了解人體生理及醫學現象。主軸包括(1)檢視細胞之代謝與生長表現:細胞之生長好與壞可由其代謝途徑與生長速度判斷。本課程將把細胞培養在不同環境下，觀察並定量其代謝活性、生長速度及代謝產物。 (2)細胞形態之定性觀察:不同組織之內部細胞，其形態不一。本課程將介紹以不同物理/化學之方法來觀察細胞形態，使學生熟悉不同生理組織中細胞之形態之差異及其與其組織生理特性之關聯。學期中將邀請校外學者及業界人士演講此些技術在業界與學術界之應用及實務性。本課程之分類大綱如下:
1.   細胞代謝與細胞活性+實驗 (測細胞活性)
2.   探討細胞生長因素+實驗 (計算細胞數目)
3.   蛋白質與DNA在細胞中的角色+實驗(定量DNA)
4.  細胞之代謝中間與最終產物(RNA與蛋白質) +實驗(定量細胞產物與ELISA原理)
5.    不同生理組織之特性+實驗(細胞外觀觀察(螢光染色))
6. 細胞外觀與生理特性之關聯+實驗(細胞外觀觀察(切片染色))
7.    生醫材料與細胞組織交互作用之實例探
description.en:
This course focuses on hands-on training of basic cell laboratory skills. The purpose is to help students understand cell physiology. The main curriculum contains 1. measuring cell growth and metabolism; 2. observing cell morphology. There will also be speakers from the industry and academic institutes to talk about more specific applications.
The class contains the following topics:
1.	Cell metabolism and viability (Experiment: measure cell viability)
2.	Cell growth (Experiment: Cell counting)
3.	Proteins and DNA (Experiment: DNA quantification)
4.	Cell intermediate and final products (Experiment: quantification of cellular products and ELISA)
5.	Tissue physiology (Experiment: fluorescent stain of cells)
6.	Cell morphology (Experiment: histological stain of cells)
Cellular interactions with biomedical materials.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學年至材料及資源工程相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生每學期必須撰寫實習心得報告以便評分。
description.en: The course is developed to enhance the on-job practical capability of students. Students are trained for an academic year in corporative company or organizations of materials and Mineral Resources Engineering related fields. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to meet the course requirement for each semester.

notes: 漢翔，限四材四甲同學修讀

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用學期至相關機構實習（實習實際天數依「校外實習」實行辦法另訂之），參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，彙交系上保存。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Students participate in one of the corporative engineering companies during curriculum session, practice and experience in the materials and mineral resources engineering related fields . A practice intern and a written report must be completed to meet the course requirement.

notes: 華航，限四材四甲同學修讀

name.zh: BIM建築資訊系統實務操作

description.zh: 目前建築工程營建產業多賴以圖文資料溝通，文件易有失誤，會提高成本、工期延長、甚至於爭議之狀況。BIM 工具之運用，可有效提升營建產業生產力。各國政府已紛紛推出 BIM 的審照制度，我國(臺灣)近年來於公共工程招標已要求BIM技術之整合運用。本課程針對BIM運用於建築生命週期中各產業間的介紹及效益、實例分享，並於課程中指導同學針對BIM軟體基礎工具使用，並教授未來實務上操作機制。
description.en: Architectural engineering construction industry on which 2D graphic data communication, the file is easy to form mistakes, will increase the cost of the extension of time, even controversial situation. The use of Building Information Modeling (BIM) software tools, which can effectively enhance the productivity of the construction industry. Governments around the world have now launched the BIM audit system. In recent years, Taiwan has asked the public works bidding integrate and use of BIM technology. This course focuses on the introduction and effective life cycle of BIM for architectural industry, examples of sharing. Guidance to students in courses based tool for BIM software.

description.zh: 建築細部設計之任務是接續基本設計之工作，以較大之比例圖說表達設計者之設計概念，其中包含材料之經驗型知識及其應用。教學上透過理論傳授以及對各種材料之特性體驗、繪製圖說、施作，搭配設計課所需以達教學目的。
description.en: The task of Detail Design is to extend the design concept of basic design in larger scale. It includes the empirical knowledge of materials and their applications. Through theory delivery and acquaintances of all kind of materials, design drawing and practice to reach the teaching goal.

description.zh: 本課程搭配設計課，其教學內容為：1.建築表現之功能與意義。 2. 透視概念與建築表現種類及方法。 3. 手繪: 二點及三點透視建構、材料工具及應用。 4. 數位媒體: 3D建模、照明表現、材質表現。 5. 攝影: 基礎建築攝影概念。 6. 圖面安排設計及多種媒體綜合應用。
description.en: 1. Architecture presentation and its roles. 2. Perspective and illustrative methodologies. 3. Drawing techiques: perspective construction; medias and applications. 4. Digital media: basic 3D modeling, scene lighting, material/texturing rendering. 5. Basics of architectural photography. 6. Presentational planning and combined applications of multi-medias.

description.zh: 本課程的目標在使學生了解工業安全衛生的重要,熟悉有關知識及緊急措施,從而增加處變之因應能力.內容包括工業安全衛生組織,事故調查分析,工廠設備安全要領,工業衛生和衛生設備.
description.en: This course is design to introduce the student to concept of the importance of industrial safety and health with emphasis on the ability of dealing with accidents. Topics covered are organization of industrial safety , analysis of Accident ,industrial health and facilities.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nature

description.zh: n
description.en: n

notes: 教師王冠生,北大三峽校區公學院1F03,博雅自然,社哲/哲

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師王冠生,北大三峽校區公學院1F01,博雅選修社哲/哲

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師王珍珊,北醫大8001教室,博雅選修文化

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師林玲光,北大三峽校區商學院1F01教室,博雅選修文化

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師陳奕凱,北大三峽校區資訊教室1F-08,博雅文化

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 教師安嘉芳,海大人社院大樓601教室,博雅選修歷史

name.zh: 臺灣海洋巡護政策與經驗之永續經

description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability.

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Philosophy

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師鍾隆琛,北大三峽校區社會學院1F01,博雅選修社哲/

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability.

notes: 教師楊子菡,北大三峽校區公學院2F36,博雅選修社哲/社

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：History

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生對歷史這門學科有一通盤、系統的認識，以便讓學生瞭解歷史的思維取向，增加個人的歷史意識。並在歷史學門的領域中，提供數門基礎及進階課程，供同學選修，以期同學從課程的學習中，理解台灣、中國乃至世界文明的進程與發展，剖析歷史學與現實的互動，提昇學生批判思考之能力。
description.en: This course focuses on getting the students familiar with the academic field of history in a more comprehensive and systematic view. The students are stimulated to think and make judgment with a view to "knowing the history," adding to a better sense of history. Further, they are guided to select some  courses in the field of history, including the formation and changes of the of Taiwan China and the World-as well as interactions between history and the reality-thus enhancing their critical ability to think and judge.

notes: 教師王俊昌,海大人社院大樓401教室,博雅選修歷史

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師安嘉芳,海大人社院大樓403教室,博雅選修文化

description.zh: 哲學既是一門兼具理想性與現實性的基礎學科，又是一種既有趣又深刻的一種思想活動。 它所探討的目標都是和人類自身與他們所生活的周遭世界密切相關的一些基本問題；這些基本問題至少包括：宇宙、知識、公平正義、道德、宗教、語言、心靈、社會、教育、愛情，和生與死。 從事哲學思考，就是對上述問題，進行一種反省。 這種反省，能夠讓我們明白形成這些問題背後的一些基本原則，以及解決這些問題的一些可能方案的理由根據和獲致這些解決方案的應有程序。 由於哲學是著重思考與反省的活動，學習哲學其實不僅僅可以幫助我們掌握和人類自身與生活世界相關問題的一些根本知識，更能培養一個負責任的社會公民不可或缺的一種思維能力和反省態度。
description.en: Philosophy is not only a fundamental subject with both ideals and practical value, but also an interesting thinking activity of depth.  The topics it discusses concern some basic questions for we human beings and the world around us.  These basic questions at least include: the universe, knowledge, equality and justice, morality, religion, language, mind, society, education, love, and life and death.  Thinking things philosophically is to reflect upon these basic questions.  The reflection of this sort leads us to understand not only the basic principles behind these questions,   also the reasons and procedures of the possible solutions to these questions.  Given philosophy is such an activity based on thinking and reflection, learning philosophy hence can help us grasp the required knowledge concerning ourselves and our living world, and more importantly, prepare a thinking ability and reflecting attitude that are needed for us to succeed in becoming responsible social citizen.

notes: 教師謝宗宜,北醫大3201教室,博雅選修社哲/哲

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Nomocracy

description.zh: 本課程以民主、法治課程為核心，重在強化公民的素養，增進政治體制及法律運作實務等之相關課程。
description.en: Democracy and nomocracy are the core curriculum, focusing on enhancing the quality of citizens and promoting the related courses in  the political system, the operation of the law practices and so on.

notes: 教師曾秀珍,北大三峽校區社會學院1F01,博雅選修法治

description.en: n

notes: 教師葉凱翔,北醫大6204教室,博雅選修自然

name.en: Elective  Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Culture

description.zh: 本課程旨在提昇學生的人文素養。透過文學概論、藝術概論與文化概論等相關課程，引導學生探索文學的妙趣，欣賞藝術的美質，瞭解文化的傳統。從古典到現代，從本土到世界，從物質到心靈，建構多元化的文化視野。以臺灣為出發點，搜尋未知的世界地圖，找到人們必然駐足的角落，以及自己不可缺席的人文風景。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to enrich the literary taste and the cultural cultivation of our students. Though the related course, like Introduction of Literature, Introduction of Art and Introduction of Culture, we hope to guide the students to explore the interest of the Literature, to enjoy the beauty of the Art and to understand the tradition of the Culture. From classic to modern, from local to universe, from material to spirit, we want to construct multiple cultural views. Taking Taiwan as a start, we would search the unknown map of the universe, and would find a corner for consequential staying and one's own liberal scenery.

notes: 教師張錯,鄭穎,北醫大2201教室,博雅選修文化

name.en: Elective Curriculum of Liberal Arts Education：Society

description.zh: 為了培養學生有關社會、經濟與管理的基礎知識，特規劃了相關的核心課程，增進學生對個人與社會的認知，及對社會整體的分析與瞭解能力,進而?化社會適應能力。
description.en: To develop the basic knowledge of society, economic and management to our students, improve them the cognition of individual and society, and the abilities of analysis and understanding, then enhance the social adjustment ability.

notes: 教師林文琪,北醫大2204教室,博雅選修社哲/社

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class. This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本課程主要是讓學生在畢業之前即獲得短期體驗車輛產業的職場經驗，此經驗包括有職場倫理外，也讓學生意識到學校教育與現實職場間的差異、產業對人才的選擇標準、自我能力基本要求的考驗、和未來可就業的相關企業。進而檢討自我的未來生涯規劃。
description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time semester. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full semester paper to fulfill the program requirements.

description.zh: 1.簡介 2.視覺與色彩 3.陰極射線管顯示器 4.電漿顯示器 5.液晶顯示器 6.電致發光顯示器 7.場發射顯示器 8.有機發光顯示器
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Sight and color 3.Cathode-ray tube(CRT) 4.Plasma panel display(PDP) 5.Liquid crystal display(LCD) 6.Electrolumisence display(ELP) 7.Field emission display(FED) 8.Organic light emitting device(OLED)

notes: 四光四與光電所合開(億光935)【停開】

description.zh: 完整且有系統的介紹產品設計實務的工作內容，從規劃設立、執行、管理、協調及最終之提案，針對實務及就業準備，邀請產業主管或負責人講授，並配合工廠及設計工作室參觀，以培養其專業知識及技能，進而了解就業市場概況及應具備之專業知識及技能。
description.en:
The overall and systematic introduction of activities in a product design case, from planning, execution, management, coordination and final presentation. 
For career -prep, this class invites directors from renowned product manufacturers and product design studios to lecture design practice and vocational preparation. 
The course might also organize field trips to allow participants to experience future design environment.

description.zh: 應用快速手繪觀念結合數位技術等工具軟體，使設計作品之發表及簡報方式能達到視覺上更豐富而生動的表達效果。
description.en: Teaching student to use digital software to simulate design proposal for a perfect presentation.

description.zh: 介紹與醫學相關之醣類生物學
description.en: The course is designed to teach graduate students about the recent advances in glycobiology with medical and biotechnological applications. The prerequisite for the course is general biochemistry. Students are expected to learn the structure, biosynthesis, chemistry and cell biology in related to bioactive glycans.

description.zh: 為加強學生設計實務能力，本課程規劃學生赴設計相關產業，至少為期9個月之校外實習，並於期滿後須由接受實習單位提具實習證明及成績考核。次一學期開學後，學生必須繳交書面或經口頭實習成果發表，由指導教師檢核實習單位成績考核，以給予實習學生最後評量成績。
description.en: For the purpose of enhance senior students' practical skill in design, the course is established to encourage students to intern in the industry for no less than 9 months. The student will then be evaluated by the industry, and by the lecturer through the examination of a written report and/or an oral presentation to demonstrate his/her effort.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，學生利用整學期到工業工程與管理相關機構實習，參與校外合作機構所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告。須在同一機構連續實習4.5月，學生應全職於實習機構實習。
description.en: The course is developed to increase on-job practice capability of students. Participants practice and learn the real operation of the industrial engineering and management related fields in one of the corporative industrial engineering company during one semester. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement. It is necessary to practice in one corporative industrial engineering and management company full-time at least 4.5 months.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，修課學生必須至化學、化工相關機構實習，參與校外合作工廠所提供之實質訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，於次一學期註冊後，再由指導教師依據學生之心得報告，加以檢核、指導撰寫成實習成果報告，彙交系上保存，可供其他同學參考。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative chemical or chemical engineering company, practice and learn the real operation in the field of molecular science and engineering. A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.

description.en: The course is designed to help students' career developments and to enhance their long working experiences prior to their graduation. Students will work at a vehicle engineering related company or research organization on-site. The duration is one full-time academic year. Students would learn the real-life operations of professional technology, acknowledge the differences between the school and working environments, understand the business needs, and develop their professional ethics. Through the program, students would be able to self-evaluate the gaps between their own capabilities and the professional needs, and establish or adjust their career development plans accordingly. A student would require to work full-time on-site the company and submit a full academic year paper to fulfill the program requirements.

name.en: Special Topics in Operating System Security

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹作業系統安全的基本要件及探討在IT產業中作業系統安全的設計與運作。課程將涵蓋各種作業系統的基本觀念及進階的Linux、Windows之常用技術。課程將會於Linux、SELinux、Windows等平台上實作，使學生對現代電腦的作業系統運作更有深入的了解。
description.en:
This course introduces the main components of operating system security and addresses the IT professional interests in the design and operation of secure operating systems. This course covers various practices, standards, and technology from Linux and Windows operating systems. This course includes a series of hand-on technical exercises in Linux, SELinux, and Windows platforms. Here are the topics covered in this course:
●Access Control
●Unix/Linux OS Security
●Windows OS Security 
●More on Windows Security + Auditing and Logging
●Authentication and Identity
●Rootkits
●Security Enhanced Linux
●Assurance + Security Kernels
●Virtual Machines + Mobile OS Security

notes: 四子四與電子所合開，國際短期課程，5/9、5/10上課

Through the program, students would learn the hands-on professional technology. Each student would be required to submit a written report right after the end of the internship for grading.

name.zh: 創意廣告與微電影製作

description.zh: 課程主要目的為結合實際廣告或微電影發想與製作，針對文創商品，人文議題，或文化主題，做一實際的設計發想與製作。透過廣告訊息的創製或微電影的拍攝，將整體構思概念，透過素材選擇，表現手法，鏡頭語言，了解整體廣告與微電影發想與製作過程，將相關創意具體實踐於數位影音作品。
description.en: The main purpose of the course is the advertisement or microfilm think and production, for the cultural and creative goods, cultural issues, or cultural themes, to make a practical design thoughts and production. Created by shooting advertising messages or microfilm, the whole idea of the concept, through material selection, performance techniques, and camera language, designers understand the overall advertising and microfilm distribution and production of thought process, specifically related to the practice of creative works in the digital audio and video work.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為讓學生可以利用暑期或其它時間至學校認可之校外公私立機構進行或參與實習，以增進學生之實務能力。學生於學校認可之校外機構實習總累計時數不得低於320小時。學生實習期滿後，應依據各系規定繳交相關實習相關成果報告，彙交所屬系保存，並作為成績核定之依據。學生校外實習學期成績之評定比例原則：實習單位占50%，輔導老師占50%，各系得依其屬性調整之。
description.en: The main purpose of this course is to elevate an all-round ability for the students at NTUT. During the summer break　or other periods of time, students are required to go to government-based organizations or industry/business-oriented agencies with respect to promoting practice of ability. The course takers will need to stay in the same individual organization or agency with an accumulated amount of time of no less than 320 hours. After the students complete the requirements in question, these organizations and agencies will offer them certificates -- or proof of any kind -- in accordance with the real performance on site. The grading principle will be equivalently decided by the thesis advisor (50%) and the on-site organization or agency (50%), respectively. The individual department or graduate institute may make proper adjustments according to the situations in need.

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為增進學生之實務能力，規定學生必須利用暑假至化工相關機構實習，參與校外合作廠商所提供之訓練，觀摩學習專業工廠之實際運作。實習期滿後須由實習機構出具實習證明及成績考核；學生必須撰寫實習心得報告，於次一學期註冊後，再由指導教師依據學生之心得報告，加以檢核、指導撰寫成實習成果報告，彙交系上保存，可供其他同學參考。
description.en: The course is developed to increase students' capability of on-job practice. Participation in one of the corporative chemical engineering company during summer vocation , practice and learn the real operation of the chemical engineering related fields . A practice intern and a well-prepared report must be completed to the course requirement.
